text: The Waterloo & City line, also nicknamed The Drain, is a short underground railway line in London. It was opened on 11 July 1898. It has two stations, Waterloo and Bank. ==References== Category:London Underground lines Category:1898 establishments in England Category:Transport in the London Borough of Lambeth Category:Transport in the City of London Category:Tunnels underneath the River Thames
title: Waterloo & City line
